title: Broodje Bewust
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Take-out, European, Dutch, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic sandwich shop. Vegan suitable sandwiches include one with hummus, one with hazelnut-fig pasta, and the vegan burger. Offers smoothies, vegan   cakes and pies, and usually a vegan muffin. Has soy milk for coffee.
